testimonials.content: The form builder has completely transformed how we collect data. It's intuitive, powerful, and the AI features are a game-changer.
We've seen a 40% increase in form completion rates since switching to this platform. The conditional logic features are exceptional.
The analytics and reporting capabilities have given us invaluable insights into our customer feedback process.

first.question: How do I create my first form?
first.answer: Click the 'Create Form' button in your dashboard and choose from our templates or start from scratch.

export.question: Can I export my form responses?
export.answer: Yes, you can export responses in multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and PDF.

share.question: How do I share my form?
share.answer: After creating your form, click the 'Share' button to get a shareable link or embed code.

introduction.page_description: Learn about Formify's powerful form building and data collection platform
introduction.welcome: Welcome to Formify - the AI-powered form builder that helps you create, manage, and analyze forms with ease. This documentation will guide you through everything you need to know to make the most of our platform.
introduction.what_is_text: Formify is a comprehensive form building platform that combines the power of artificial intelligence with intuitive design tools to help you create engaging forms, surveys, and questionnaires...
getting_started: Create your first form using AI or templates
Share your form and collect responses
Analyze results with our powerful dashboard
introduction.requirements_text: Formify is a cloud-based solution that works in any modern web browser. We recommend using:
